text: I would love it if we could have a folder structure for website/landing pages
AJ has wanted the tree view thing back for a long time, this kinda ties into that
I was just going to comment! This has been my go to in almost any convo lol

:bulb: for the form module, it would be nice to have the user be able to select what heading gets applied to the form title. Right now, it just defaults to H3. This is when using HubSpot default form module (not a custom one using the {% form %} tag)
Also, if no title is actually set, could it not just put an empty h3 (or whatever h) tag there?
or, if there's a solution to this that I'm missing, I'm all ears

Usually in custom modules, I create a dropdown selection so I can do things like:
```
<{{module.headingStyle}}> {{module.headingText}} </{{module.headingStyle>
```
Mainly because even the normal "Heading" module only lets you choose the style from the DM and not page level
